siteTitle.title: Site Title
siteTitle.subtitle: Title of site. Used as page title. <italic>default: {{defaultValue}}</italic>

siteUrl.title: Site Url
siteUrl.subtitle: Publicly accessible URL of this site. <italic>ex: {{example}}</italic>

timezone.title: Server Timezone
timezone.subtitle: Set the local server timezone for date display
timezone.tooltip: User can override in user profile. Requires Server Restart

timeFormat.title: Time Format
timeFormat.subtitle: Set the format for time display

shortDateFormat.title: Short Date Format
shortDateFormat.subtitle: Set the format for short dates

longDateFormat.title: Long Date Format
longDateFormat.subtitle: Set the format for long dates
